attributes.additional_details: to preserve at least one class 507 and class 508 train into the british collection of trains. Thease trains where built back between 1978 and 1980 and have been operating scince on the merseyrail network. They are some of britains oldest trains but there still going strong and have a few more years left on their lives. Please help to preserve one by signing this petition. Thankyou.
